SELECT * FROM opencps_dictitem INNER JOIN opencps_dictcollection on opencps_dictitem.dictCollectionId = opencps_dictcollection.dictCollectionId WHERE
opencps_dictitem.issueStatus = 1
and opencps_dictcollection.collectionCode = ?
and opencps_dictitem.itemCode = ?
and opencps_dictitem.parentItemId = ?
and opencps_dictitem.groupId = ?
and (lower(ExtractValue(itemName, '//ItemName')) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT * FROM opencps_dictitem LEFT JOIN opencps_dictcollection ON opencps_dictitem.dictcollectionid = opencps_dictcollection.dictcollectionid WHERE (opencps_dictcollection.groupid = ?) AND (opencps_dictcollection.collectionCode = ?) AND (opencps_dictitem.issueStatus = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT di.* FROM opencps_dictitem AS di LEFT JOIN noibo_qa.opencps_dictitemlink AS dil ON di.dictItemId = dil.dictItemId WHERE di.groupid = ? AND di.dictCollectionId = ? AND di.itemName LIKE ? AND dil.dictItemLinkedId = ? AND di.issueStatus = ?

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT di.* FROM opencps_dictitem AS di LEFT JOIN noibo_qa.opencps_dictitemlink AS dil ON di.dictItemId = dil.dictItemId WHERE di.groupid = ? AND di.dictCollectionId = ? AND di.itemName LIKE ? AND dil.dictItemLinkedId = ? AND di.issueStatus = ? ) AS result
